metadata.name: Bubble | Daniela
metadata.description:
Bubble is an animated short film of our ability to remain at peace with ourselves despite whatever obstacles we find in our path.

This NFT includes an 11.4" x 7.5" x 1.1 in" Infinite Objects digital frame (shipped separately) hand signed, numbered, with thumbprint and holographic sticker.

The frame resolution is 4K, Duration 3:36, Dimensions 3840 x 2160, 560.1 MB, MPEG-4. The digital frame will not play the music track.

Due to Foundation restrictions, this NFT versionâ€™s dimensions are 1280 x 720, 48.7 MB.

There are 4 versions of this film with 4 different main characters. 

Each NFT main character is 1 of 1.

There are 4 NFTs total.

Visit  https://www.bubble.film/ for more info. 

Email desire@desireobtaincherish.com with your wallet address for full resolution version with music, and shipping address for digital frame.

There is only on digital frame per NFT. If the NFT is transferred or sold, it is up to the seller to release the digital frame to the new collector.
